sprykerComponent.name: rating-selector

defines.name: data
defines.contract:
value: 0,
    minValue: 1,
    maxValue: 5,
    steps: 5,
    useHalfSteps: false,
    inputId: '',

methods.name: checkInput
methods.description: Toggles the disabled attribute of the input element.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: A number for checking if the attribute is to be set or removed from the input element.

methods.name: updateRating
methods.description: Sets the value attribute and toggles the special class name.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: A number for setting the attribute.
